title.narrative: Hurricanes Irma and Maria CSSF non-ODA

description.narrative: This activity (Hurricanes Irma and Maria CSSF non-ODA) is a component of Humanitarian Response to Hurricanes Irma and Maria in the Caribbean reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Not for profit organisation' and a budget of £15,000,000. This component benefits VIRGIN ISLANDS (BRITISH), and works in the following sector(s): Material relief assistance and services . , with the following implementing partners: British Red Cross, Crown Agents Limited, Damco UK Ltd, Palladium International Ltd (UK). The start date is 28-09-2017 and the end date is 30-06-2018.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA

description.narrative: Social Protection, Land Housing and Community Amenities - Social Affairs - Social Protection, Land Housing and Community Amenities - emergency relief
Aggregated spend of less than £500 - Financial Year 2017 Quarter 3
